HistorySet.History: 12-Jan-2017: Updated to format 5.4 (the opsname is not anymore generated automatically but is not needed anyway)
12-Jun-2017: Added “a” flag to the container flags in order to have them used for archiving partitions.

CustomAlgorithm.name: alg_verif_started
alg_verif_completed
alg_verif_queued
TANK_Pressure_Avg

DefaultSignificance.reasonForWarning: This is a critical command, pay attention
Use this command with caution. There are better ways to do this.

Argument.name: destinationId
Argument.shortDescription: CFDP remote entity id (in case the remote entity is Yamcs, the id must match with one defined in the localEntities cfdp service configuration)

Argument.name: pdu_loss_0
Argument.shortDescription: Simulate packet loss by dropping the PDU with this number. 0 = metadata PDU.

CustomAlgorithm.name: alg_verif_queued
alg_verif_completed
